Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the statement made by the Mpumalanga Department of Health, which denied the existence of any coronavirus cases in Rob Ferreira Hospital.
Lack enough support: The claim is based on an article that does not provide sufficient evidence or sources to support the assertion that the family died from COVID-19.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the family's deaths were caused by the coronavirus, despite the lack of official confirmation or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility that the family may have died from other causes unrelated to the coronavirus.
